attributes.action: TELL UK TAXPAYERS how much the new NPCC is costing them over and above what has already been handed over to ACPO.
attributes.additional_details: Added to the money we already hand over to the Police Federation it makes it questionable as to whether we taxpayers REALLY know how much the administration of senior police officers - WITH NONE OF THE THREE ORGANISATIONS BEING OVERSIGHTED OR AUDITED BY THOSE TAXPAYERS - is costing us and if it is something we can any longer afford.
